message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,000. I know you'll find great value in it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value this product at a higher price point. Could you consider $10,500? It's a fair offer that reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,800? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
